queue.title: Add liveness probe timing telemetry
queue.description: Log actual probe wall-clock times to liveness-timing.json during cache misses. Lets A sessions track whether wq-668 optimizations (concurrency 10→20, timeout 12→9s) and R#271 cron-warm pattern actually reduced average E session startup time. Currently rely on maintain-audit estimates which sample infrequently.

outcome.note: Added timing telemetry to engagement-liveness-probe.mjs. Logs wallMs, avgMs, p95Ms, per-platform breakdown, cache hit ratio to liveness-timing.json. Capped at 100 entries. Verified with live probe.

queue.title: Knowbster analytics dashboard cron
queue.description: Add periodic analytics snapshot to cron — run knowbster-collection.mjs --analytics weekly, store results in knowbster-analytics-history.json for trend tracking over time (sales velocity, bundle vs individual ratio changes).

outcome.note: Created cron-knowbster-analytics.sh with weekly schedule. Exits cleanly when no published collections. Capped at 52 weekly snapshots.

queue.title: Clawsta auto-publish: add caption freshness from live data
queue.description: clawsta-publish.mjs captions use hardcoded pattern count (38 patterns). Make caption generators pull live data: knowledge_read for pattern count, session-history.txt for session count, platform-circuits.json for live/down counts. Currently health caption does this but session and knowledge captions have stale numbers.

queue.title: Add timing summary to A session maintain-audit
queue.description: Read liveness-timing.json in maintain-audit and include avg wall-clock, p95, and trend direction in audit report. Closes the loop on wq-676 telemetry by making timing data visible in audit output.

queue.title: Add timing telemetry to service-liveness.mjs
queue.description: Mirror wq-676 pattern: log wall-clock timing for service-liveness.mjs probes to a separate timing file. Currently only engagement-liveness has timing. Service-liveness runs from cron-platform-probe.sh and during B session hooks — timing data would show if batched service probes are within budget.

queue.title: Liveness timing histogram endpoint
queue.description: Add GET /api/liveness-timing to api.mjs that returns aggregated timing stats from liveness-timing.json — avg/p95/trend over last 10/50/100 probes. Makes telemetry queryable by external consumers without reading files.

queue.title: Publish first knowbster collection bundle
queue.description: Use knowbster-collection.mjs --publish to create and publish the agent-architecture collection. Pre-requisite for wq-675 cron to produce actual data. Check that collection templates have enough verified patterns.
